CMD_BAN_DESC: Bans a user from the server.
MOD_BAN_NOUSER: You must mention a user or provide their ID.
CMD_KICK_DESC: Kicks a user from the server.
MOD_KICK_NOUSER: You must mention a user or provide their ID.
MOD_MUTE_NOUSER: You must mention a user or provide their ID.
MOD_UNMUTE_NOUSER: You must mention a user or provide their ID.
MOD_WARN_NOUSER: You must mention a user or provide their ID.
CMD_TIMEOUT_DESC: Applies a temporary timeout to a user.
MOD_TIMEOUT_NOUSER: You must mention a user or provide their ID.
MOD_TIMEOUT_NOMINUTES: You must specify the timeout minutes.
MOD_TIMEOUT_SUCCESS: User {{user}} is in timeout for {{minutes}} minutes. Reason: {{reason}}
MOD_UNBAN_NOUSER: You must provide the user ID.
MOD_UNBAN_NOTFOUND: User not found in the ban list.
